title: Mamata Banerjee Visits Bengal Village Where 8 Were Burnt Alive - NDTV
content:
1. Mamata Banerjee Visits Bengal Village Where 8 Were Burnt Alive  NDTV
  2. Birbhum Violence: BJP Delegation Led By Suvendu Adhikari Arrives At Site Of Violence  Republic World
  3. Rampurhat Violence: Eyewitness Recalls Night When His House Was Immolated  The Quint
  4. Opposition leaders make a beeline for violence-hit Birbhum village  The Indian Express
  5. 'Cops failed us': Tension in Birbhum village; Residents flee after 8 charred to death in Bengal  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: In the political fight after eight people were burnt alive by a mob at a village in Bengal's Birbhum, Mamata Banerjee will today visit the area. The Chief Minister has been accused by the opposition BJP of presiding over a complete collapse of law.
